message.body: Hello my love! Quick question: for the rehearsal dinner the entree options will be crab cakes, chicken, or steak. There is a vegan entree (polenta with red beans) but we need the count for it ahead of time. Do you want the vegan? (I know you sometimes ea
Oh you're so cute! Thanks for checking! I'll go with the vegan option, please!
Okay fab! I had it a few weeks ago and it is soooooo gooooood you are making an excellent decision haha
Oh awesome!!! I'm glad it gets your foodie stamp of approval!
Hahaha yes well the chef even came out to talk to us and told us about his dabbling with veganism, so he really knows what he's doing :-D
Wait do you guys move this weekend????
Yeah well we've been moving throughout the month...so this weekend will be another moving trip...almost done though!!
Yikes yikes!! When will you be officially in??
Haha the 31st! So after my last day of work we'll go straight up to pa and won't have a place down here anymore!
